Name: Stranger
Text: Not even possessing that of a baby,

Name: Stranger
Text: You've even forgotten how to crawl, but that's fine.

Name: Creator
Text: Use "A" and "D" to move left and right. Use "K" to jump. Use "S" to interact with something of interest.

Name: Stranger
Text: Take some time to get used to moving again. You were locked up for a quite a while after all.

Name: Stranger
Text: The rest is yours. Have fun...
